interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: ASP Form-A-Nail, 24 Reusable Forms Review Date: 2017/03/10 Store: ASP Product Description: ['Asp Forman ail is a quick and easy way to create a set of acrylic nails. 24 reusable forms. Easy to follow step by step directions.'] Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Size': '24 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'ASP', 'Style': 'French', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '4.3 x 4 x 3.5 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'Item model number': '12443563806', 'UPC': '012443563806', 'Manufacturer': 'STAR NAIL-ASP'} Review Text: I just got this product at a beauty supply!

I love it!!! First time trying and it turned out awesome!!!!

I'm no a nail technician, or any sort of professional but it worked great, I did short, next time I'll do longer, after creating the nail I designed with some crystals!

So much cheaper, and I can do whatever I like going to a nail salon again!! Review Title: I wish I knew this trick before! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
ASP Form-A-Nail, 24 Reusable Forms ASP ['Asp Forman ail is a quick and easy way to create a set of acrylic nails. 24 reusable forms. Easy to follow step by step directions.'] {'Size': '24 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'ASP', 'Style': 'French', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '4.3 x 4 x 3.5 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'Item model number': '12443563806', 'UPC': '012443563806', 'Manufacturer': 'STAR NAIL-ASP'} I just got this product at a beauty supply!

I love it!!! First time trying and it turned out awesome!!!!

I'm no a nail technician, or any sort of professional but it worked great, I did short, next time I'll do longer, after creating the nail I designed with some crystals!

So much cheaper, and I can do whatever I like going to a nail salon again!! I wish I knew this trick before!
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Beauty Enthusiast**: Demonstrates a strong interest in DIY beauty solutions, particularly in nail care and enhancement.
- **Positive First Experience**: Expressed enthusiasm and satisfaction with the product upon the first use, indicating a willingness to explore new beauty techniques independently.
- **Cost-Conscious**: Values affordability and cost-saving alternatives to salon services, suggesting a preference for budget-friendly beauty options.
- **Creative Expression**: Enjoys customizing and designing nails, including the use of embellishments like crystals, indicating a flair for creativity and personal expression in beauty.
- **Novice to Moderate Skill Level**: Not a professional in nail care but expresses confidence in trying new techniques, reflecting an eagerness to learn and improve in this area.
- **Desire for Convenience**: Appreciates products that are easy to use with clear directions, indicating a preference for straightforward beauty solutions.

Overall, this user appears to be a creative, cost-conscious beauty enthusiast eager to explore DIY nail art and techniques, valuing positive experiences that enhance their skills and self-expression.
